Adjudications

  1. To access Adjudications, click 'Adjudications' from the main menu at the top of the screen.
  2. Cards: Each card shows a high level overview of an adjudication including:
    1. Title of an adjudication
    2. Nickname of an adjudciation
    3. Status of an adjudication
    4. Coordinate System Information
    5. An External Link to the adjudcation boundary
    6. The number of Sections and the name of the bureau managing the adjudcation
    7. The total number of subfiles and how many are finalized vs still in progress
    8. Counts for how many other record types are included in the adjudcation
    9. The number of subfiles the current user is watching
    10. The court case(s) for this adjudication
  3. Filtering Adjudications
    1. Open Filters by clicking 'Filters' (under the main navigation)
    2. Select Filters
    3. Click 'Apply Filters'
  4. Adjudication Actions (all can be accessed by the 'three dot' action button.
    1. Editing Adjudication Information. With appropriate permission, you can edit the basic adjudication information and change the status of the adjudication.
  5. Viewing Sections: you can view the section of the adjudication by clicking the three dot action button and clicking 'Sections'
    1. Adding Sections: click 'add section' button, complete the form and submit the form
    2. Editing Sections: click the three dot button at the end of the section row, click 'edit'.
  6. Courts and Judges: access from the Adjudication Card three dot button
    1. Adding Courts: Click 'Add Court Case' button, fill out form and submit
    2. Editing Courts: Click the three dot button, click edit and make edits to the form
  7. Adding New Adjudications
    1. Click the 'Add New Adjudication' button from the right of the Adjudication screen, fill out the form and save.
  8. Split Adjudication: click the three dot button and select 'Split Adjudication'
    1. Select available sections from the right of the screen
    2. Click 'Add Selected' button to the appropriate new adjudication (A or B)
    3. Once all sections of have been added, click 'Split Adjudication' button
  9. Merge Adjudications: access from the three dot button on an adjudication card
    1. Current adjudication is preselected
    2. Select from available adjudications to merge
    3. Click 'Marge Adjudication' button and confirm merge
  10. Global Documents: access from three dot button on Adjudication Card
    1. Add Global Document: Click 'Add Global Document' button at top right of screen
    2. View/Edit Global Document: Click three dots at end of global document row
